Title: Godzilla
Writer: Takeo Murata, Ishirô Honda, Shigeru Kayama (story), Tomoyuki Tanaka (story "The Giant Monster from 20,  000 Leagues Under The Sea"), Eiji Tsuburaya (story "The Giant Monster from 20,  000 Leagues Under The Sea")
Actors: Akira Takarada, Momoko Kôchi, Akihiko Hirata, Takashi Shimura
Plot: American nuclear weapons testing results in the creation of a seemingly unstoppable, dinosaur-like beast.
